data.name: Role of Hex
data.detailed_description:
It starts out with a single hexagonal structure, you get to decide its purpose, but by itself, it won't stand for long.
A creature is approaching, looking to destroy your hexagon. Build a turret, Defend it, multiply it.
The enemy is not alone anymore, a group is coming, but your cannons are loaded and your shields are raised, you are ready.
And so are they.

Gameplay

Role of Hex is a real-time strategy game where you defend your hexagonal base from the dangers of The Wasteland.
Enemies are constantly approaching as you expand outwards, trying to do what you can in order to survive and thrive.
You are expected to collect upgrades, acquire blueprints of special buildings, to use every droplet of hope that the environment gives to you in order to match the evergrowing horde that is inevitably coming.

Key Features

  • Infinite random generated world that changes every single run
  • 4+ different biomes with different structures and enemy compositions
  • 10+ different buildings unlockable via blueprints
  • Secret Synergies between special buildings
  • 15+ Different enemy variations, some more dangerous than others
  • 40+ Upgrades divided into 3 tiers: White, Yellow and Purple
  • Active skills upgrades to give you options when the struggle is inevitable
  • 20+ Unlocks, which add more content to the gameplay as you play
  • Structures scattered around the map with unique skills and effects

data.short_description: Role of Hex is a real-time strategy game where you defend your hexagonal base from the dangers of The Wasteland. Gather upgrades and unlock special buildings to survive this terribly hostile land as endless waves of enemies approach. But be quick, time is ticking and the waves are getting bigger.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: 2.5 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia GeForce 6000 series or ATI Radeon 9000 series
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
